field.name: summary
field.value: Add support for string templates in ITemplateEngine and NVelocityTemplateEngine

field.name: description
field.value:
I have the need to process templates that are not stored on the file system or in an assembly. Most come from a database.
I suggest adding 2 Process methods for dealing with string based templates.
bool Process(IDictionary context, String templateName, TextWriter output, String inputTemplate); bool Process(IDictionary context, String templateName, TextWriter output, TextReader inputTemplate);
I have attached a patch file that includes tests. I am hoping that this support can be included.
